games.name: Classic Pong
games.description: The classic Pong game with smooth controls and AI opponent. Use W and S keys to move your paddle and compete against the computer.

controls.instructions: Press W to move paddle up, S to move paddle down

games.name: Memory Match Game
games.description: Test your memory with this fun card-matching game. Flip cards to find matching pairs of cute animal emojis. Multiple difficulty levels available!

controls.instructions: Click on cards to flip them and find matching pairs

games.name: Click the Squares
games.description: A simple arcade-style game where you click on red squares as they appear. A demonstration of AI-generated single-file game development.

controls.instructions: Click on the red squares to score points

games.name: Snake Game
games.description: The classic Snake game with high score tracking. Control the green snake with arrow keys, eat red food to grow longer, and avoid hitting walls or yourself.

controls.instructions: Use arrow keys to control the snake's direction

games.name: Space Invaders
games.description: Classic Space Invaders game. Control your spaceship, shoot at invading aliens, and defend Earth. Destroy all invaders to win!

controls.instructions: Use left/right arrow keys to move, spacebar to shoot
